invhilb

Inverse of Hilbert matrix

Syntax

h = hilb(n)
h = hilb(n, className)

Input argument

n

a scalar, nonnegative integer.

className

'single' or 'double' (default).

Output argument

h

Hilbert matrix.

Description

hilb computes the Hilbert matrix.

Bibliography

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Hilbert, and Thanks to https://nhigham.com/2020/06/30/what-is-the-hilbert-matrix/

Example

h = hilb(5)

See also

invhilb.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
